Title: TrippLiteMon
Description: A small program to monitor the TrippLite SMART1500LCDT UPS Battery Backup using HidD_GetFeature codes.
HomeWiki:
Tripp Lite UPS Monitor

NOTE: The hardware interface code is contained in the other required packages.  If you download the source, you need to download the other projects listed at the bottom of the page, under the section titled 'BUILDING.'

This is a small program to monitor some of the settings on the Tripp Lite SMART1500LCDT UPS battery.

9/8/2015: Updated for Windows 10, compiled with refactored libraries, new deployment MSI method (replacing One-Click), bug fixes, improvements. I also consider this one release/stable.  Running for a year with no problems.

The release binaries are built for 64 bit systems, and should run on Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 with the .NET Framework 4.5 installed. The official download msi is binaries only.  To get the source code, visit the source tree.

New For the June 18, 2014 Alpha 23, Translucent Desktop Cool Mode; drag it around with the cross-arrows in the right corner, and it remembers its position.

 

BUILDING: 

This project requires my other two projects to build: 

The DataTools Visual Basic Utility Library | The DataTools Visual Basic Utility Library - Interop

Use the DTInteropTrippLite.vbproj project file in the Interop project tree for loading that project.

Compile the EXE for the architecture of your computer/operating system.  You may also need to locate the TrippLiteMon.snk for the other projects... or deactivate strong named signing.
